address.title: Address
address.text:
Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
King Fahd District, King Abdulaziz Street

hours.title: Working Hours
hours.text:
Saturday - Thursday: 9:00 AM - 10:00 PM
Friday: 2:00 PM - 10:00 PM

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How can I track my order?
faq.a1: After confirming your order, a tracking number will be sent to you via SMS or email. You can use this number to track your order status.
faq.a2: We only accept cash on delivery. You will pay for your order in cash when receiving the products from the delivery agent.
faq.a3: Delivery usually takes 2-5 business days within major cities, and 5-7 business days for other areas.
faq.q4: Can I return or exchange the product?
faq.a4: Yes, you can return or exchange the product within 7 days of receipt, provided the product is in its original condition and unused.
faq.a5: Yes, delivery is free for all orders within Morocco with no minimum order amount.
faq.q6: How can I cancel my order?
faq.a6: You can cancel your order within two hours of confirmation by contacting customer service or sending a message through the contact form.
faq.a7: Customer service is available from Saturday to Thursday from 9:00 AM to 10:00 PM, and on Friday from 2:00 PM to 10:00 PM.

modal.title: Message Sent Successfully
modal.message: Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
